definition: trembling with fear/with fear and trepidation

sentences.english: Natives will cringe and squirm with embarrassment at such brashness.
sentences.chinese: 對於這種輕率魯莽，當地人會因尷尬而戰戰兢兢。

sentences.english: Saw manager the whole face is not happy, we gingerly, cautious.
sentences.chinese: 看到經理滿臉不高興，我們戰戰兢兢，如履薄冰。

sentences.english: Now, though, investors are getting jittery.
sentences.chinese: 現在，儘管，投資者們戰戰兢兢。

sentences.english: I timidly told Lenny that my clasps were open.
sentences.chinese: 我戰戰兢兢地告訴萊尼我的鞋釦開了。

sentences.english: Serve the Lord with fear and rejoice with trembling.
sentences.chinese: 要存畏懼心來事奉永恆主，要戰兢兢快樂。

sentences.english: Trembling, I asked how she knew about the numbers.
sentences.chinese: 我戰戰兢兢問她如何知道號碼的。

sentences.english: Feather ink green trembling with fear to say.
How long do not fear of the scripture sound outside the ring.
sentences.chinese: 未幾久戰戰兢兢的經文聲在屋外響起。

sentences.english: However, this love, always in fear, treading on thin ice.
sentences.chinese: 但這種愛，總讓人戰戰兢兢，如履薄冰。

sentences.english: Foreigners lost heart and came trembling out of their fortresses.
sentences.chinese: 外邦人要衰殘，戰戰兢兢地出他們的營寨。

sentences.english: I waited apprehensively for him to comment.
sentences.chinese: 我戰戰兢兢地等着他給出評論。

sentences.english: And when he had spoken this word unto me, I stood trembling.
sentences.chinese: 他對我說這話，我便戰戰兢兢地立起來。
